name: Smart PopUp Blaster
author: Devnet

sections.description:
Smart PopUp Blaster plugin can display multiple popups, it’s highly customizable so you can take control over your popup behavior. Add call to actions, increase your social followers, increase your mailing lists by adding any type of forms or display any message in a simple popup.
With this fully-responsive plugin, your pop-ups will look fantastic on every device.

Features:

  • Multiple PopUps
  • Choose where to show each popup
  • Exit Intent popup trigger
  • Time Delay popup trigger
  • Scroll popup trigger
  • Click popup trigger
  • Fully-Responsive
  • Highly Customizable
  • Full control over popup content
  • Many Animation Effects
  • Mailchimp is supported
  • Display any shortcode in popup

Additional Info

Idea Behind / Philosophy: Just a little leightweight plugin for all WordPress users out there to make their popups look better. I’ll try to add more plugin/theme support and more plugin option over time. So stay tuned.
sections.installation:
1. Upload smart-popup-blaster to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Smart PopUp Blaster in admin panel > Add New PopUP
  4. Enjoy
sections.faq:
How to open a popup by pressing a link, image or button ?

See help page in popup admin panel

short_description: Easy to use popup plugin, highly customizable, scroll, click & time-delay triggered popups. Add forms, social media boxes, videos & more.
